item.text: Now Jesus was praying in a certain place. When he stopped, one of his disciples said to him, “Lord, teach us to pray, just as John taught his disciples.”

So he said to them, “When you pray, say:

“‘Father, may your name be honored;

may your kingdom come.
Give us each day our daily bread,

and forgive us our sins,

for we also forgive everyone who sins against us.

And do not lead us into temptation.’”
Then he said to them, “Suppose one of you has a friend, and you go to him at midnight and say to him, ‘Friend, lend me three loaves of bread,

<st data-num="1894" class="">because</st> a <st data-num="5384" class="">friend</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">mine</st> has <st data-num="3854" class="">stopped</st> here while <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="3598" class="">journey</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> to <st data-num="3908">set before</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846">him.’</st>

<st data-num="2548">Then<n id="1" /> he</st> will <st data-num="611" class="">reply</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2081">from inside</st>, ‘Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3930 2873">bother</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. The <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> is <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="2808" class="">shut</st>, <st data-num="3326" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">children</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2845" class="">bed</st>.<n id="3" /> I <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="450">get up</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> anything.’<n id="4" />
I tell you, even though the man inside will not get up and give him anything because he is his friend, yet because of the first man’s sheer persistence he will get up and give him whatever he needs.
“So I tell you: Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and the door will be opened for you.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="154" class="">asks</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">receives</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2212" class="">seeks</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the one who <st data-num="2925" class="">knocks</st>, the door<n id="2" /> will be <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, if your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="154">asks for</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>, will <st data-num="1929" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3789" class="">snake</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="473">instead of</st> a <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> if he <st data-num="154">asks for</st> an <st data-num="5609" class="">egg</st>, will <st data-num="1929" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="4651" class="">scorpion</st>?<n id="1" />
If you then, although you are evil, know how to give good gifts to your children, how much more will the heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him!”
Now he was casting out a demon that was mute. When the demon had gone out, the man who had been mute began to speak, and the crowds were amazed.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1722">By</st> the power of <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>, he <st data-num="1544">casts out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>!”

<st data-num="2087" class="">Others</st>, to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st><n id="1" /> him,<n id="2" /> began <st data-num="2212">asking for</st><n id="3" /> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">realizing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1270" class="">thoughts</st>, <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3956">Every</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="1266" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself</st> is <st data-num="2049" class="">destroyed</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="1266" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="3624">household</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> is <st data-num="1266" class="">divided</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>? I ask you this <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="3" /> you <st data-num="3004" class="">claim</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="954" class="">Beelzebul</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">whom</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1544">out</st>? <st data-num="1223 3778" class="">Therefore</st> they will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judges</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1147" class="">finger</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="686" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> has already <st data-num="5348" class="">overtaken</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> a <st data-num="2478">strong man</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2528" class="">fully armed</st>, <st data-num="5442" class="">guards</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="833" class="">palace</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5224" class="">possessions</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1515">safe</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1875" class="">when</st> a <st data-num="2478" class="">stronger man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1904" class="">attacks</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3528" class="">conquers</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, he <st data-num="142" class="">takes away</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">first man’s</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3833" class="">armor</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> the man <st data-num="3982" class="">relied</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1239">divides up</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4661">plunder</st>.<n id="7" />
Whoever is not with me is against me, and whoever does not gather with me scatters.
“When an unclean spirit goes out of a person, it passes through waterless places looking for rest but not finding any. Then it says, ‘I will return to the home I left.’

When it <st data-num="2064" class="">returns</st>,<n id="1" /> it <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> the house<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4563">swept clean</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2885">put in order</st>.<n id="3" />
Then it goes and brings seven other spirits more evil than itself, and they go in and live there, so the last state of that person is worse than the first.”
As he said these things, a woman in the crowd spoke out to him, “Blessed is the womb that bore you and the breasts at which you nursed!”
But he replied, “Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and obey it!”
As the crowds were increasing, Jesus began to say, “This generation is a wicked generation; it looks for a sign, but no sign will be given to it except the sign of Jonah.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="2495" class="">Jonah</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> to the <st data-num="3536">people of Nineveh</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="938" class="">queen</st> of the <st data-num="3558" class="">South</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="1453">rise up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> she <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4009" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of <st data-num="4672" class="">Solomon</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">now</st>,<n id="4" /> something <st data-num="4183">greater</st><n id="5" /> than <st data-num="4672" class="">Solomon</st> is <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>!
The people of Nineveh will stand up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it, because they repented when Jonah preached to them—and now, something greater than Jonah is here!
“No one after lighting a lamp puts it in a hidden place or under a basket, but on a lampstand, so that those who come in can see the light.

<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="3088" class="">lamp</st> of your <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>. <st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="573" class="">healthy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5460">full of light</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1875" class="">when</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4190">diseased</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> is <st data-num="4652">full of darkness</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="4648">see to</st> it<n id="1" /> that the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>.
If then your whole body is full of light, with no part in the dark, it will be as full of light as when the light of a lamp shines on you.”
As he spoke, a Pharisee invited Jesus to have a meal with him, so he went in and took his place at the table.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st> was <st data-num="2296" class="">astonished</st> when he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> Jesus<n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4412" class="">first</st> <st data-num="907" class="">wash</st> his hands<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="712" class="">meal</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3568">Now</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1855" class="">outside</st> of the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4094" class="">plate</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2081" class="">inside</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1073" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="724" class="">greed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4189" class="">wickedness</st>.<n id="2" />

You <st data-num="878" class="">fools</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756">Didn’t</st> the one who <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="1855" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="2081" class="">inside</st> <st data-num="2532">as well</st>?<n id="2" />
But give from your heart to those in need, and then everything will be clean for you.
“But woe to you Pharisees! You give a tenth of your mint, rue, and every herb, yet you neglect justice and love for God! But you should have done these things without neglecting the others.

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st>! You <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> the <st data-num="4410">best seats</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="783" class="">elaborate greetings</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="58" class="">marketplaces</st>!<n id="4" />
Woe to you! You are like unmarked graves, and people walk over them without realizing it!”
One of the experts in religious law answered him, “Teacher, when you say these things, you insult us too.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3544" class="">experts in religious law</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well</st>!<n id="3" /> You <st data-num="5412" class="">load</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5412" class="">down</st> with <st data-num="5413" class="">burdens</st> <st data-num="1419" class="">difficult to bear</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> you <st data-num="846" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">refuse</st> to <st data-num="4379" class="">touch</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="5413" class="">burdens</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1147" class="">fingers</st>!

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>! You <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tombs</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="846">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st>.

<st data-num="686" class="">So</st> you <st data-num="3144" class="">testify</st> that you <st data-num="4909" class="">approve</st> of<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">prophets</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> their<n id="4" /> tombs!<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘I will <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, some <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">whom</st> they will <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecute,’</st>

<st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st> may be <st data-num="1567">held accountable</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> that has been <st data-num="1632" class="">shed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">beginning</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="6" class="">Abel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="2197" class="">Zechariah</st>,<n id="2" /> who was <st data-num="622" class="">killed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3342" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">sanctuary</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, it will be <st data-num="1567" class="">charged</st> <st data-num="575" class="">against</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>.
Woe to you experts in religious law! You have taken away the key to knowledge! You did not go in yourselves, and you hindered those who were going in.”
When he went out from there, the experts in the law and the Pharisees began to oppose him bitterly and to ask him hostile questions about many things,
plotting against him to catch him in something he might say.
